Package managerpro.Controller

Class TableInformationController

java.lang.Object
managerpro.Controller.TableInformationController
public class TableInformationController
extends java.lang.Object
TableInformationController handles all the data and events related to table information panel. An instance of this class is created when table information panel FXML is loaded.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Controller controller
    Controller- variable of this class.
    private ReservationsEntity currentReservation
    Holds the ReservationEntity-object of the current reservation
    private javafx.scene.control.Label dateLabel
    Label-node to display the date of the current reservation.
    private Model model
    Holds the model of this class.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label nameLabel
    Label-node to display the client name of the current reservation.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label nextReservationLabel
    label-node to display the date and time of the next reservation.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label phoneLabel
    Label-node to display the client phone number of the current reservation.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label statusLabel
    Label-node to display the status of the table ("Free"/"Taken").
    private int tableID
    Holds the information of the table ID.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label tableTitleLabel
    Label-node to display table title.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label timeLabel
    Label-node to display the starting and ending time of the current reservation.

    • setController

      public void setController​(Controller controller)
      Sets the controller for this class.

    • setModel

      public void setModel​(Model model)
      Sets the model for this class.
      Parameters:
      model - Model -class created at Main controller

    • setTableID

      public void setTableID​(int tableID)
      Sets the tableID of the currently selected table
      Parameters:
      tableID - Table id of current table

    • updateTableInformationPanel

      public void updateTableInformationPanel​(int tableID)
      Updates the table panel based on the table ID parameter. Uses model-object to fetch reservations for the provided table. Sorts out the active reservations and displays the current reservation if there is any. Also displays the next reservation date and time if there is any.
      Parameters:
      tableID - table id to update

    • freeTable

      public void freeTable()
      Deletes the current reservation.

    • confirmReset

      public void confirmReset()
      Displays a confirmation dialog before deleting a reservation.

    • openAllReservationsPanel

      public void openAllReservationsPanel()
      Loads the reservations panel with reservations for the currently selected table.
